problem_text: Find the perimeter of \triangle C P D if the perimeter of \triangle B P A is 12, B M = \sqrt { 13 }, and C N = 3 \sqrt { 13 }.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of \triangle CPD if the perimeter of \triangle BPA is 12, BM = \sqrt{13}, and CN = 3\sqrt{13}.
annotat_text: Find the perimeter of $\triangle C P D$ if the perimeter of $\triangle B P A$ is 12 $, B M=\sqrt{13},$ and $C N=3 \sqrt{13}$
